Let all search the Scriptures diligently for themselves, and not be satisfied to have the leaders do it for them, else we shall be as a people in a position similar to that of the Jews in Christ's time--having plenty of machinery, forms, and customs, but bearing little fruit to God's glory. It 


                                    -372- 

is time for the church to realize her solemn privileges and sacred trust, and to learn from the great Teacher.
